title: Japan Day Festival at Central Park
preview: Japan Day @ Central Park is an annual festival celebrating Japanese culture. The festival will be held on May 10th, 2015, kicking off with Japan Run, followed by the Kids’ Race.
seo_title: Japan Day Festival at Central Park | WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: Japan Day @ Central Park is an annual festival celebrating Japanese culture. The festival will be held on May 10th, 2015, kicking off with Japan Run, followed by the Kids’ Race.
contents: Japan Day @ Central Park is an annual festival celebrating Japanese culture. The festival will be held on May 10th, 2015, kicking off with Japan Run, followed by the Kids’ Race.
